text: 2.12 Jud 10 Binɨb anɨb okok pen, kɨli tap tɨtay dɨl mɨdeb agɨl ma nepal okok monmon agjupal. Gos tɨmud kɨli ak ke pal ak pal ak mɨdɨl, chen ladek chag ladek okok gos kɨli mɨdebal tek mɨdebal. Mɨdebal anɨb ak, sab chag gon lel, dek paklel kubal tek ak kɨlop gɨnɨgab. God kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab.
